EmailTemplate.description: Send follow-up to participants who have had their 1x1 with Kathryn.
EmailTemplate.name: SPA 3x1 Read Out
EmailTemplate.subject: Sales Performance Assessment Follow-Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Background: Kathryn Connolly met with you to provide a 30-minute interpretation of your profile to discuss the following:
Reviewed scores above 70% and below 30% Reviewed certain sets which may affect the overall profile Reviewed specific combinations of Sales Practices Reviewed specific combinations of Sales Motivators Discussed personal strengths and development opportunities identified by the individual Discussed next steps in developing your Sales Action Plan
Our goal is to capitalize on the strengths you bring to the team as well as put in place a Sales Action Plan related to your identified development opportunities. We want to ensure your continued success and grow your skills and talents as it relates to your work at WEX.
Next Steps: As we discussed during your 1x1, we asked you to identify one or two behaviors to develop. During this meeting, you will share with your manager/team lead the actions steps you have outlined for yourself.
In preparation of this meeting, please review your SPA results and complete your Sales Action Plan. See attached document. Review the Action Steps provided by Management Research Group providing suggestions on development. During the 3x1 meeting, you will discuss your Sales Action Plan with your manager. We will also review what support you need from sales training to move forward.
Thank You, {!Case.OwnerFullName} WEX Global Sales Training
